pages.text: You can see (almost) all items in the JEI menu. Click an item (or press R) to inquire its reciple, press U to see its usage.$(br)    You can search items by modID/tags/color.

For example, enter @create to check all items whose modID contain "create". Enter $ingots/tin to see all items with tag "ingots/tin" (technically all Tin Ingots). You can see more search methods in JEI config menu.
